alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 12:37AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Umatilla County through 100 AM PDT... At 1236 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Umatilla Reservation, or 12 miles west of Meacham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
